ValidationRule.description: 'Asset', 'Product', 'Solution', 'Product Variant' and 'Product Release' cannot be modified if one of the following event is Completed.('Restore', 'Service Disruption Provided', 'Temporary Solution Provided', 'Solution Provided')
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND(CH_RecordTypeCheck__c , NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status , 'Closed')), CH_LegacyCaseNumber__c=null, OR( ISCHANGED(AssetId), ISCHANGED(ProductId), ISCHANGED( CH_Solution__c ), ISCHANGED(CH_ProductVariant__c), ISCHANGED( CH_Product_Release__c ) ), OR( CH_IsCompleteRestore__c , CH_IsCompleteServiceDisruptionReport__c , CH_IsCompleteTemporarySolution__c , CH_IsCompleteSolutionProvided__c ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: 'Asset', 'Product', 'Solution', 'Product Variant' and 'Product Release' cannot be modified if one of the following event is Completed.('Restore', 'Service Disruption Provided', 'Temporary Solution Provided', 'Solution Provided')
